If you already bought my stuff on Gumroad, check your email later this week. I'll send you a free eBook as a Black Friday gift. If you bought through Amazon, send me a DM (either with a receipt or, better yet, a selfie with my book) and I‚Äôll send you the link.

The discount will be active for the duration of the Black Friday celebrations. If you know someone who could benefit from learning how to build a bootstrapped business and an audience, please let them know.

These coupons will work in ADDITION to the 50% off, by the way. 

Here are all my digital products on @Gumroad:

https://t.co/WdJ3f4vAMW

https://t.co/a0wbgb74Mo

Find your Following is the sequel to The Embedded Entrepreneur in a new medium. This course will teach you how to build in public, gather a following of actually interested people, and stay yourself while doing it. No hacks. No shortcuts. 

https://t.co/T49N7eOplV https://t.co/4tn9tlLZet

The Embedded Entrepreneur is a hands-on audience-building bible for the intrepid founder. This book will not just tell you what it means to build an audience-first business, it will give you the tools to get started while you read it. 

https://t.co/28qr7ymSdm https://t.co/FVrPmHDunH

Zero to Sold is your guide to building a bootstrapped business from scratch to acquisition. It‚Äôs an extensive companion to your entrepreneurial journey that dives into every aspect at every stage. Get the details right from day one.

https://t.co/hf7VuQKCCI https://t.co/6LG30faNio

For "Black Friday," my digital books & courses are 50% off. On Amazon and Gumroad, you‚Äôll find Zero to Sold, The Embedded Entrepreneur, and Find your Following for half price.

And that‚Äôs BEFORE purchasing power parity discounts (up to an additional 70%).
